title: Sweet and spicy Moroccan carrot dip
ingredients: ['450g carrots, peeled and thinly sliced', '3 cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '1 (5cm) piece fresh ginger, peeled and thinly sliced', '3/4 teaspoon salt, divided', '100g apricot jam or preserves', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '4 teaspoons toasted sesame oil', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground coriander', '1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper']
